name: SpeechSynthesisEvent.name
description: The name read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface returns the name associated with certain types of events occuring as the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text is being spoken: the name of the SSML marker reached in the case of a mark event, or the type of boundary reached in the case of a boundary event.

refs.name: Web Speech API
refs.description: The definition of 'name' in the 'Web Speech API' specification.
